about.server: BlockProducer 2010 Intel Xeon X3470 16Gb RAM 250Gb SSD and Relay 2010 Intel i3-550 12Gb RAM 250Gb SSD make a full private baremetal node running 100% solar energy. 2 cloud relays for extended DDoS security
